WorkItem.Description:
Steps to reproduce:
1) Have belt "BS Socket" unchecked
2) Click on the belt slot and filter down to only one item.  I used Belt of the Impaler: two sockets were shown
3) Cancel out of the gear selection and check "BS Socket"
4) Click on the belt slot again, no gemmings with BS socket are shown
5) Select a belt, then click on the belt slot again.  Now ones with 3 sockets are shown.
WorkItem.Summary: [Base] Cache not refreshed when "BS Socket" checked
